pages.title: Trowel
pages.text: A $(item)Trowel$() allows a builder to place random blocks from their hotbar when right-clicking a surface.$(br2)Trowels also have built-in functionality with the $(item)Roads and Roofs$() mod--Meaning that they can place filler items like bricks or flagstones randomly as well.
Inspired by the trowel tool from $(item)Quark$()--A mod by Vazkii
